SELECT a.a_acc_name, a.a_acc_kind, a.a_acc_address, r.a_r_state, r.a_r_price, rm.u_r_check_in, rm.u_r_check_out, ai.a_i_image FROM tbl_admin_accommodation a LEFT JOIN tbl_admin_room r ON a.a_acc_no = r.a_acc_no LEFT JOIN tbl_user_reservation rm ON r.a_r_no = rm.a_r_no LEFT JOIN tbl_accommodation_image ai ON a.a_acc_no = ai.a_acc_no where 1=1
AND a.a_acc_name like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%')
AND NOT (u_r_check_in < #{endDay} AND u_r_check_out > #{startDay})
AND a.a_acc_kind = #{accmValue}
AND a.a_acc_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')
AND r.a_r_state = '대실'
AND r.a_r_state = '숙박'
ORDER BY r.a_r_price DESC
ORDER BY r.a_r_price ASC
